author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
Migration of HLT to stage-2 L1T:
- Partially still relying on customization file - will be fixed in a later PR once the l1extra-PRs are also in 80X(!) => this is now incorporated!
- GT payload added explicitly should eventually become part of the GT => this is now done with #13709
- Relvals beware: @ relval25ns now resolves to the new stage-1 Fake1 HLT menu. @ relval2016 is added as a new choice: HLT with stage-2 L1T

@mmusich @hengne
title: Migration of HLT to stage-2 L1T (81X)
